name: x-merger
description:
Element providing solution to no problem in particular.

##### Example

    <x-merger></x-merger>
blurb: Element providing solution to no problem in particular.

attributes.name: author
attributes.description: The `author` attribute sets an initial author

properties.name: fancy
properties.description: `fancy` is a property that does something fancy.

methods.name: sayHello
methods.description: The `sayHello` method will return a greeting.

methods.name: fireLasers
methods.description:
The `fireLasers` method will fire the lasers. At least
it will dispatch an event that claims lasers were fired :)

events.name: x-merger-lasers-success
events.description:
The `x-merger-lasers-success` event is fired whenever we
call fireLasers.

methods.name: fireLasers
methods.description:
The `fireLasers` method will fire the lasers. At least
it will dispatch an event that claims lasers were fired :)

methods.name: wizard
methods.description: The `wizard` attribute sets an initial wizard

methods.name: x-extendee-lasers-fail
methods.description:
The `x-extendee-lasers-fail` event is fired whenever we
call fireLasers.
